titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to Katepalli Sreenivasan Papers RG.045

repository.corpname: Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries

did.physloc: Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology 5 MetroTech Center Brooklyn, New York, 11201 (646) 997-3943 polyarchives@nyu.edu

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Katepalli Sreenivasan Papers span Sreenivasan's time as the last President of Brooklyn Poly (then called the Polytechnic Institute of New York University/NYU-Poly) and as the first dean of the NYU Tandon School of Engineering, where he served in this position from 2013-2018. This collection contains correspondence from 2011-2017.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Katepalli Sreenivasan Papers; RG 045; box number; folder number or item identifier; Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Katepalli Sreenivasan Papers contain documents from 2011-2017. This set of correspondence was collected by Sreenivasan during his time as President of Brooklyn Poly and layer as the first dean of the NYU Tandon School of Engineering. The collection is 2 linear feet, located on bay 26, shelf 2E.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is housed in 2 boxes and arranged in 1 seriesâ€”the Correspondence series.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated to the Polytechnic Institute of New York University Archives by Katepalli Sreenivasan in 2020.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Polytechnic University in all its forms are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Poly Archives. Please contact the Poly Archives, polyarchives@nyu.edu, 646-997-3530.
